// Error messages Task needs a name Task not found with id: %d Task not updated with id: %d Task not deleted with id: %d Task not added Task not completed with id: %d Database error: %s/string> Database error: %s Network error: %s An unknown error occurred Task name cannot be empty Start date must be before end date End date requires start date Duration cannot be negative Subtask name cannot be empty
